reviews.text: This is a lovely old station, trains run frequently, friendly staff and very clean and tidy. Free toilet facilities. Small shop on site too.
Good service, but from middlesbrough to thornaby Transpennine express conductor usually don't check tickets for single and return. what a waste

I have never used middlesbrough train station, it's clean and easy to navigate through platforms, trains are easy assessable and useful information comes across well. Lifts are located at both platforms, the train ticket machine is easy to use x
Not a big station but the service is just acceptable

Used this station alot, it's the basic small train station you'd expect... with limited services ie not open 24hrs a day.
Cleanliness is typical for a station ie can be smelly at time's... if there's a local football match expect to be mobbed the platforms become packed beyond belief. 
Staff seem happy to help if needed like with any station.
Wheel chair users can access the platforms, they will need assistance to get onto the trains.
Also in cold weather don't expect any waiting rooms to be warm... I've never experienced that in this station.
